fields.name: Forgot password
fields.subject: Forgot your password
fields.body:
Password Reset

You recently requested to reset your password for your account. Click the button below to reset it.  
 
Reset your password 

If you did not request a password change, ignore this email or let us know.

© Zeerobills | All Right Reserved 2022

fields.name: Send Credentials
fields.subject: Your login credentials
fields.body:
Hello {NAME}

 

You recently requested login credentials.

Login Information:
Email: {EMAIL}
Password: {PASSWORD}

fields.name: Password Reset
fields.subject: Your password reset successfully
fields.body:
Hello {NAME}

 

You recently reset your password successfully.
 

© zeerobills | All Right Reserved 2022

fields.name: Forgot password with otp
fields.subject: Forgot your password
fields.body:
Password Reset

You recently requested to reset your password for your account. Please enter this otp to create new password.

OTP: {OTP}

If you did not request a password change, ignore this email or let us know.

© zeerobills | All Right Reserved 2022
